attributes.action: allow James Bond movies to be created tax free.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: James Bond is a modern part of British culture and represents our film industry on a world stage every couple of years. Its time that we, as a nation, said thank you to this. Therefore, I proposition the Prime Minister to allow Danjaq, the bond production company, to create the films Tax free, to allow them to use the saved funds to invest more in the film!
